articles.title: News24.com | International Covid-19 update: '6 killed by Kenyan police during lockdown', US to curb immigration
articles.description: A 13-year-old boy is one of six people in Kenya who have been killed in alleged police violence during the enforcement of a dusk-to-dawn curfew, and other Covid-19 news.
articles.content:
A 13-year-old boy is one of six people in Kenya who have been killed in alleged police violence during the enforcement of a dusk-to-dawn curfew implemented to curb the spread of the new coronavirus, according to Human Rights Watch (HRW), Al Jazeera reports.

articles.title: News24.com | US failed to block UN resolution on equal access to any future coronavirus vaccine
articles.description: The UN General Assembly has demanded equal access for any future Covid-19 vaccine, but its seeming unanimity was a fluke. The United States in fact opposed the resolution but acted too late to stop it, diplomats say.
articles.content:
United Nations – The UN General Assembly has
demanded equal access for any future Covid-19 vaccine, but its seeming
unanimity was a fluke. The United States in fact opposed the resolution but
acted too late to stop it, diplomats say.
The 193 members of th… [+3643 chars]

articles.title: News24.com | 117 million children face measles risk from Covid-19 response: UN
articles.description: Around 117 million children worldwide risk contracting measles because dozens of countries are curtailing their vaccination programmes as they battle Covid-19, the United Nations warns.
articles.content:
Around 117 million children worldwide risk contracting measles because dozens of countries are curtailing their vaccination programmes as they battle Covid-19, the United Nations warned on Tuesday.
